section.paragraph: Select the Configuration below to mange elements of that Configuration. If the Configuration is not listed below, select Create Configuration above in the navigation bar.

section.heading: Create Configuration
section.paragraph: To create a new Configuration, enter the name below, then click the create button.

section.heading: Edit Configuration
section.paragraph: The "#{Configurations.name}" configuration is shown below.
section.heading: Primary Level: #{Configurations.assignment_level_primary.description}
Secondary Level: #{Configurations.assignment_level_secondary.description}
Tertiary Level: #{Configurations.assignment_level_tertiary.description}
section.paragraph: Facilities using this configuration are shown below. ________________________________________________________________

section.heading: Assignment Level Primary
section.paragraph: Select an assignment level to assign it as the primary level.

section.heading: Assignment Level Primary
section.paragraph: Click assign to choose "#{AssignmentLevels.description}" as assignment level primary.

section.heading: Assignment Level Secondary
section.paragraph: Select an assignment level to assign it as the secondary level.

section.heading: Assignment Level Secondary
section.paragraph: Click assign to choose "#{AssignmentLevels.description}" as assignment level secondary.

section.heading: Assignment Level Tertiary
section.paragraph: Select an assignment level to assign it as the tertiary level.

section.heading: Assignment Level Tertiary
section.paragraph: Click assign to choose "#{AssignmentLevels.description}" as assignment level tertiary.

section.heading: Facility
section.paragraph: Select an facility to assign "#{Configurations.name}" as the configuration.

section.heading: Facility
section.paragraph: Click assign "#{Configurations.name}" as the configuration for facility "#{Facilities.name}".

section.heading: Remove Configuration
section.paragraph: Click delete to remove the "#{Configurations.name}" configuration.

section.heading: Assignment Levels
section.paragraph: Select the Assignment Level below to manage the attributes of that Assignment Level. If the Assignment Level is not listed below, select Create Assignment Level above in the navigation bar.

section.heading: Create Assignment Level
section.paragraph: To create a new Assignment Level, enter the description and code below, then click the create button.

section.heading: Edit Assignment Level
section.paragraph: To change the Assignment Level, enter the description and code below, then click the update button.

section.heading: Remove Assignment Level
section.paragraph: Click delete to remove the "#{AssignmentLevels.description}" assignment level.

workflow.name: ManageDevices
workflow.description: Manage Devices Engage is aware of

section.heading: Search For Phone
section.paragraph: To search for a specific phone, enter search criteria below. If you do not have the phone number for the phone you are looking for, you can also search using the device's name, user's first name, last name or login information. To search by phone number, the phone must be online. All search fields are optional.

Listed below are phones that are online. Select a phone to view its details. If you do not see the desired phone in the list below, use the search above to specify more specific criteria.
| Phone | S t a t u s | I P address | Phone Type | Device Name | Department | User Name |

section.heading: Search For Phones
section.paragraph: To search for a specific phone, enter search criteria below. If you do not have the phone number for the phone you are looking for, you can also search using the device's name, user's first name, last name or login information. To search by phone number, the phone must be online. All search fields are optional.

section.heading: Phone List
section.paragraph: Search results based on the criteria entered are listed below. If you do not see the desired phone in the list below, select Search For Phone from the navigation bar above to change your search criteria.

Select a Phone to view its details.
| Phone | S t a t u s | I P address | Phone Type | Device Name | Department | User Name |

section.heading: Phone Details
section.paragraph: Listed below are the details for the phone that was selected. To assign this phone to a department, select Assign Default Department from the navigation bar above. To remove the phone's current default department, select Remove Default Department from the navigation bar above. To view another phone's details, select Manage Phone Menu from the navigation bar above. To assign another user to the phone, select Assign a User to #{Devices.lines.number} below.
section.heading: Phone #{Devices.lines.number}
Phone Details
section.paragraph: Listed below are the details for the phone that was selected. To view another phone's details, select Manage Phone Menu from the navigation bar above.
section.heading: Phone #{Devices.lines.number}
Select Default Department
section.paragraph: Listed below are the available departments that can be assigned as the default department for this phone. To view the phone details instead, select Phone Details from the navigation bar above. To view another phone's details instead, select Manage Phones Menu from the navigation bar above.
section.heading: Phone: #{Devices.lines.number} Current Department: #{Devices.unit.facility.name} #{Devices.unit.name}
section.paragraph: Select a department from the list below to set it as the default department for this phone.

section.heading: Assign Default Department
section.paragraph: To assign this phone to a specified department, select Assign below. To view the phone details instead, select Phone Details from the navigation bar above. To view another phone's details instead, select Manage Phones Menu from the navigation bar above.
section.heading: Assign #{Devices.lines.number} to #{Units.facility.name} #{Units.name}?
Phones Without A Department
section.paragraph: Listed below are the phones that are not assigned to a department. To view another phone's details instead, select Manage Phones Menu from the navigation bar above.
section.heading: Number Of Phones Without A Department: #{Devices/Phones_that_are_not_linked_to_a_unit.count}
section.paragraph:
Select a phone to view details.
| Phone | S t a t u s | I P address | Phone Type | Device Name | Department | User Name |

section.heading: Select Default Department
section.paragraph: Listed below are the available departments that can be assigned as the default department for your phone. If you do not want to assign a default department, you can select Manage Phones Menu from the navigation bar above or choose to go back to the list of Phones Without Department.
section.heading: Phone: #{Devices.lines.number} Current Department: #{Devices.unit.facility.name} #{Devices.unit.name}
section.paragraph: Select the department below to set as the default department for this phone.

section.heading: Assign Default Department
section.paragraph: To assign this phone to a specified Department, select Assign below. To start over and not assign the phone to a department, select Manage Phones Menu from the navigation bar above or choose to go back to the list of Phones Without Department.
section.heading: Assign #{Devices.lines.number} to #{Units.facility.name} #{Units.name}?
Disconnected Phones
section.paragraph: Listed below are the phones which are disconnected. To view another phone's details instead, select Manage Phones Menu from the navigation bar above. To search the list of disconnected phones, select Search For Disconnected Phones from the navigation bar above.
section.heading: Number Of Phones Disconnected: #{Devices/XMPP_phones_that_are_disconnected.count}
section.paragraph: | Phone | S t a t u s | I P address | Phone Type | Device Name | Department | User Name |

section.heading: Search For Disconnected Phones
section.paragraph: To search for a specific disconnected phone, enter search criteria below. If you do not have the phone number for the phone you are looking for, you can also search using the user's first name, last name or login information. All search fields are optional.

workflow.name: ManageFacility
workflow.description: Workflow to create and manage Beds, Rooms, Units and Facilities

section.heading: Select a Facility
section.paragraph: Select the Facility below to create the Units, Rooms and Beds in that Facility. If the Facility is not listed below, select Create Facility above in the navigation bar.

section.heading: Create New Facility
section.paragraph: To create a new Facility, enter the name below and select the Create button.

section.heading: Create New Unit in #{Facilities.name}
section.paragraph: To create a new Unit, enter its name below and select the Create button. Units are used to associate Users, Phones, and Message Templates. To select an already created Unit, select it from the list below. To edit #{Facilities.name}, select Edit Facility above in the navigation bar.
Units in #{Facilities.name}

section.heading: Create New Room in #{Units.name} - #{Units.building_name} #{Units.floor}
section.paragraph: To create a new room in #{Units.name}, enter the room number and optional room name below and select the Create button. To modify an existing room in #{Units.name}, select it from the list below.
Rooms in #{Units.name}

section.heading: Create New Bed in Room #{Rooms.name}
section.paragraph: To create a new bed in Room #{Rooms.room_number}, enter a bed number below and select the Create button. A paired location will also be created. Enter a dial back number for the bed which will be used when a nurse calls back to the bed when they receive an alert. Listed at the bottom of the page are beds that already exists for the Room. Do not try to create a bed that already exists. To remove a bed from #{Rooms.room_number}, select it from the list below.
Beds in #{Rooms.room_number}

section.heading: Edit Facility
section.paragraph: Displayed below is the Facility's name. To make changes, select the edit field and make the necessary changes and then select the Update button. To remove the Facility, select Remove Facility above in the navigation bar.

section.heading: Edit Unit
section.paragraph: Displayed below is the Unit's name. To make changes, select the edit field and make the necessary changes and then select the Update button. To remove the Unit, select Remove Unit above in the navigation bar.

section.heading: Edit Room
section.paragraph: Displayed below is the Room's name. To make changes, select the edit field and make the necessary changes and then select the Update button. To remove the Room, select Remove Room above in the navigation bar.

section.heading: Edit Bed
section.paragraph: Displayed below is the Bed Number and the Dial Back Number. To edit those, enter the correct information into the correct field and then select the Update button.

section.heading: Remove Facility
section.paragraph: A Facility can only be removed if there are not any Units, Rooms or Locations assigned to it. If there are not any Units, Rooms or Locations listed below, you may remove #{Facilities.name} by selecting the Delete button. If there are Units, Rooms or Locations listed below, you will first need to remove them then remove the Facility.
Listed below are the Units in the Facility. _____________________________________________
Listed below are the Rooms assigned to the Facility. _____________________________________________
Listed below are the Locations assigned to the Facility. _____________________________________________

section.heading: Remove Unit #{Units.name} in #{Units.facility.name}
section.paragraph: A Unit can only be removed if there are not any Rooms assigned to it. If there are not any Rooms listed below, you may remove #{Units.name} by selecting the Delete button. If there are Rooms listed below, select the room and you will be taken to Create New Bed. At the top of Create New Bed you will have the option to remove the room.
Listed below are the Rooms assigned to the Unit. _____________________________________________

section.heading: Remove Room #{Rooms.name} in #{Rooms.unit.name}
section.paragraph: A Room can only be removed if there are not any Beds assigned to it. If there are not any Beds listed below, you may remove #{Rooms.room_number} by selecting the Delete button. If there are Beds listed below, you will first need to remove them. Select the bed from the list below and you will be taken to Edit Bed where you will have the option to remove the Bed.
Listed below are the Beds assigned to the Room. _____________________________________________

section.heading: Remove Bed #{Beds.bed_number} in Room #{Beds.room.name}
section.paragraph: Listed below are Locations that the Bed is assigned to, you will be able to remove the Bed but be aware the Locations will still exist and may need to be updated or may not have any beds associated to them.
Listed below are the Locations assigned to the Bed. _____________________________________________

section.heading: Search Room
section.paragraph: To search for room, enter the room number and optional room name below and select the Search button.

section.heading: Select Room
section.paragraph: Below is a list of rooms that meet your search criteria.

section.heading: Remove Room #{Rooms.room_number}
section.paragraph: A Room can only be removed if there are not any Beds assigned to it. If there are not any Beds listed below, you may remove #{Rooms.room_number} by selecting the Delete button. If there are Beds listed below, you will first need to remove them. Select the bed from the list below and you will be taken to Edit Bed where you will have the option to remove the Bed.
Listed below are the Beds assigned to the Room. _____________________________________________

section.heading: Edit Bed #{Beds.bed_number}
section.paragraph: Displayed below is the Bed Number and the Dial Back Number. To edit those, enter the correct information into the correct field and then select the Update button.

workflow.name: ManageFunctionalRoles
workflow.description: A workflow to manage functional roles for the facility.

section.heading: Select Facility
section.paragraph: Select the facility for which to manage Functional Roles.

section.heading: Functional Roles for #{Facilities.name}
section.paragraph:
Below are the active Functional Roles for #{Facilities.name}. Select a Functional Role below to edit or remove that role. To view a list of inactive Functional Roles for #{Facilities.name}, select View Inactive Functional Roles below. To create a new Functional Role, select Create New Functional Role from the navigation bar above.
Single-Bed Functional Roles ________________________________________

section.heading: Inactive Functional Roles for #{Facilities.name}
section.paragraph:
Below are the inactive Functional Roles for #{Facilities.name}. Select a Functional Role below to edit or remove that role. To go back to the list of active Functional Roles, select Functional Roles for #{Facilities.name} in the navigational bar above.
Single-Bed Functional Roles ________________________________________

section.heading: Create New Functional Role
section.paragraph: To create a new Functional Role choose single bed or multi bed role. A single bed role is for a location that represents one bed. A multi-bed role is for a location which may represent more than one bed as in the case of a hospital department. This allows a caregiver such as a charge nurse to be assigned to a group of beds instead of each individual bed.

section.heading: Create New Functional Role
section.paragraph: Enter the new Functional Role information below and select "Create". New Functional Roles are always active by default.

section.heading: Edit #{FunctionalRoles.name} (#{FunctionalRoles.abbreviation})

url-link.label: Change the active/inactive state for this role
Change the location type for this role

section.heading: Change Active/Inactive State For #{FunctionalRoles.name} (#{FunctionalRoles.abbreviation})
section.paragraph: To change this Functional Role to another active state, select the link below. To go back to the edit page for this Functional Role, select "Edit #{FunctionalRoles.name} (#{FunctionalRoles.abbreviation})" above.

section.heading: Change Active/Inactive State For #{FunctionalRoles.name} (#{FunctionalRoles.abbreviation})
section.paragraph: To change this Functional Role to another active state, select "Change #{FunctionalRoles.name} (#{FunctionalRoles.abbreviation}) to inactive" below. To go back to the edit page for this Functional Role, select "Edit #{FunctionalRoles.name} (#{FunctionalRoles.abbreviation})" above.

section.heading: Change Active/Inactive State For #{FunctionalRoles.name} (#{FunctionalRoles.abbreviation})
section.paragraph: To change this Functional Role to another active state, select "Change #{FunctionalRoles.name} (#{FunctionalRoles.abbreviation}) to active" below. To go back to the edit page for this Functional Role, select "Edit #{FunctionalRoles.name} (#{FunctionalRoles.abbreviation})" above.

section.heading: Change Location Type For #{FunctionalRoles.name} (#{FunctionalRoles.abbreviation})
section.paragraph: To change this Functional Role to another active state, select the link below. To go back to the edit page for this Functional Role, select "Edit #{FunctionalRoles.name} (#{FunctionalRoles.abbreviation})" above.

list.value: Change #{name} (#{abbreviation}) from single to multi bed.
Change #{name} (#{abbreviation}) from multi to single bed.

section.heading: Change Location Type For #{FunctionalRoles.name} (#{FunctionalRoles.abbreviation})
section.paragraph: To change this Functional Role to another location type, select "Change #{FunctionalRoles.name} (#{FunctionalRoles.abbreviation}) to single bed" below. To go back to the edit page for this Functional Role, select "Edit #{FunctionalRoles.name} (#{FunctionalRoles.abbreviation})" above.

section.heading: Change Location Type For #{FunctionalRoles.name} (#{FunctionalRoles.abbreviation})
section.paragraph: To change this Functional Role to another location type, select "Change #{FunctionalRoles.name} (#{FunctionalRoles.abbreviation}) to multi-bed" below. To go back to the edit page for this Functional Role, select "Edit #{FunctionalRoles.name} (#{FunctionalRoles.abbreviation})" above.

section.heading: Remove #{FunctionalRoles.name} (#{FunctionalRoles.abbreviation})?
section.paragraph: Select the link below to remove #{FunctionalRoles.name} (#{FunctionalRoles.abbreviation}) if it has no assignments. If the Functional Role has been used on any assignment, it may not be removed from the system. As an alternative, the Functional Role may be moved to an inactive state on the "Edit #{FunctionalRoles.name} (#{FunctionalRoles.abbreviation})" page. To go back to the edit page for this Functional Role, select "Edit #{FunctionalRoles.name} (#{FunctionalRoles.abbreviation})" above.

list.value: The Functional Role #{name} (#{abbreviation}) has #{assignments.count} assignments and cannot be removed.
The Functional Role #{name} (#{abbreviation}) has no assignments and may be removed.

section.heading: Remove #{FunctionalRoles.name} (#{FunctionalRoles.abbreviation})?
section.paragraph: Select the button below to remove #{FunctionalRoles.name} (#{FunctionalRoles.abbreviation}). To go back to the edit page for this Functional Role, select "Edit #{FunctionalRoles.name} (#{FunctionalRoles.abbreviation})" above.

workflow.name: ManageLocations
workflow.description: Workflow to manage Locations

section.paragraph: Locations are used in staff assignment. Locations can represent a bed, a department, or any set of places.
section.heading: Search Locations
section.paragraph:
To search for a location, enter your search criteria below. Leave all fields blank to search for all locations. Maximum number of search results is 101 locations.
Listed below are locations without any places assigned. To assign a bed or department to the location, select the location from the list to edit the location.

Locations without assigned places.
Name | Department | Facility

section.heading: Select a Department
section.paragraph: Select from the available departments below to view the locations for the department.

section.heading: Locations for #{Units.facility.name} #{Units.name}
section.paragraph: Select a location from the available list to edit the location.

section.heading: Location Search Results
section.paragraph:
Search results are listed below. The search results display the location's Name, Department, and Facility.
To view additional locations, return to the menu and search again.
Name | Location ID | Department | Facility

section.heading: Edit Location
section.paragraph:
Displayed below are the location's Facility, Department, and Name along with beds that are currently assigned to the location and the required roles for the location. Select the link for the Department to view the Locations for the Department.
To change the location's Name, edit the value in the box below and then click Update. To remove a bed, department, or required role from the location, select the bed, department, or role from the list.
To assign a place to the location, select Assign Bed or Assign Department above in the navigation bar. To set a department for the location, select Set Department below. To assign a required role to the location, select Assign Role above in the navigation bar. To remove the location, select Remove Location above in the navigation bar.

Listed below are beds that are currently assigned to the location.
Department | Room | Bed

Listed below are departments that are currently associated with the location.
Facility | Department

Listed below are the roles that are currently required by the location.
Role Name | Group Name | Facility

section.heading: Remove Bed
section.paragraph: Click to remove Bed: #{Beds.bed_number} in Room: #{Beds.room.room_number} in Department: #{Beds.room.unit.name} from #{Locations.facility.name} : #{Locations.name}

section.heading: Remove Department
section.paragraph: Click to remove Department: #{Units.name} in Facility: #{Units.facility.name} from #{Locations.name}.

section.heading: Location Bed Search
section.paragraph:
To search for a bed to add to the location, enter the Department, Room Number, or Bed.
Listed below are the beds currently assigned to the location.

Beds currently assigned to the location.
Department | Room | Bed

section.heading: Select a Bed
section.paragraph:
Choose the Bed that you want to assign to the location.
Department | Room | Bed

section.heading: Assign Bed to Location
section.paragraph: Assign Bed: #{Beds.bed_number} in Room: #{Beds.room.room_number} in Department: #{Beds.room.unit.name} to #{Locations.facility.name} : #{Locations.name}?

section.heading: Search for a Department
section.paragraph:
To search for a department to add to the location, enter the Department or Facility below.
Listed below are the departments currently assigned to the location.

Departments currently assigned to the location.
Facility | Department

section.heading: Select a Department
section.paragraph:
Choose the Department that you want to assign to the location.
Facility | Department

section.heading: Assign Department to Location
section.paragraph: Assign Department: #{Units.name} in Facility: #{Units.facility.name} to #{Locations.facility.name} : #{Locations.name}?

section.heading: Select a Department
section.paragraph: Choose the Department that you want to assign to the location.

section.heading: Set Department for Location
section.paragraph: To set department #{Units.name} in facility #{Locations.facility.name} for #{Locations.name}, select Set Department below.

section.heading: Remove Location?
section.paragraph: Select the link below to remove the Location #{Locations.facility.name} : #{Locations.units.name} : #{Locations.name} if it has no staff assignments. If the Location has any assignments, it may not be removed from the system. To go back to the edit page for this Location, select "Edit Location" above.

list.value: The Location #{facility.name} : #{units.name} : #{name} has #{assignments.count} assignments and cannot be removed.
The Location #{facility.name} : #{units.name} : #{name} has no assignments and may be removed.

section.heading: Remove Location
section.paragraph: Click to remove Location #{Locations.facility.name} : #{Locations.units.name} : #{Locations.name}

section.heading: Select a Facility for New Location
section.paragraph: From the list below, select the facility for the new location.

section.heading: Select a Department for New Location
section.paragraph: From the list below, select the department for the new location.

section.heading: Select a Bed for New Location
section.paragraph:
From the list below, select a bed for the new location. If you don't see the bed desired, select Search Bed above. To create a location with the previously selected department, select Create Department Location above.
Department | Room | Bed

section.heading: Location Description
section.paragraph: Enter the name of the location below. For example, "All Beds in #{Units.name}".

section.heading: Location Description
section.paragraph: Enter the name of the location below. For example, "#{Units.name} Code Blue".

section.heading: Search Bed to add to Location
section.paragraph: To search for a bed in Department: #{Units.name} to add it to the new location, enter the Room Number or Bed below.

section.heading: Search for a Role
section.paragraph: To search for a role required for assignment by the location, enter the name or abbreviation.

Listed below are the roles that are currently required by the location. Do not assign the same role twice to the same location. Trying to use the same role for the location again will fail to create the association.

section.heading: Select a Role
section.paragraph: Select the role you want to assign to the location.

section.heading: Search for a Group
section.paragraph:
To search for a group required for an assignment as #{FunctionalRoles.name} by the location #{Locations.facility.name} : #{Locations.name}, enter the name or facility.
To assign the role to the location without selecting a group, select Assign Role from the navigation bar.

section.heading: Select a Group
section.paragraph:
Select the group you want to assign to the location.
Group | Facility

section.heading: Assign Role to Location

list.value: The group #{group.name} : #{group.facility.name} is linked to the role #{role.name} for the location #{location.name}. A group may only be linked to one role and location. Using this group will break the existing association in favor of the selections made. To link the group anyway, select the Assign button. To delete the other required functional role, select this text. To select a different group, select Search Groups above.

section.heading: Assign Role to Location
Remove Role
section.paragraph: Click to remove Role: #{RequiredFunctionalRoles.role.name} with the group #{RequiredFunctionalRoles.group.name} : #{RequiredFunctionalRoles.group.facility.name} from #{RequiredFunctionalRoles.location.facility.name} : #{RequiredFunctionalRoles.location.name}

workflow.name: ManageMyMessageFavoritesPhone
workflow.description: Users can manage their message favorites from their phone.

section.paragraph: Remove "#{Templates.name}" from your Favorites List?
Add the message "#{Templates.name}" as a favorite?

workflow.name: ManageMyQuickResponseFavoritesWeb
workflow.description: Users can manage their quick response favorites.

section.heading: Favorites List
section.paragraph: The list below displays all quick responses that are currently selected as your favorites. To remove a quick response from your favorites list, select it below. To add a quick response to your favorites list, select Add a Favorite from the navigation bar above.

section.heading: Select Quick Response
section.paragraph:
Below are lists of all quick responses available in the system. Select the quick response from the appropriate list to add it as a favorite.
Quick Responses that do not require a room number:
Quick Responses that require a room number:

section.heading: Add as Favorite Confirmation
section.paragraph: To add the quick response "#{Templates.name}" as a favorite, select Add Favorite below. To cancel adding the quick response, select Manage My Quick Response Favorites or Quick Response List from the navigation bar above.

section.heading: Remove as Favorite Confirmation
section.paragraph: To remove the quick response "#{Templates.name}" from your favorites list, select the Remove button below. To cancel removing the quick response, select Manage My Quick Response Favorites from the navigation bar above.

workflow.name: ManagePresenceStates
workflow.description: A workflow to manage the various presence states

section.heading: Select Facility
section.paragraph: Select the facility for which you wish to manage Presence States.

section.heading: Presence States for #{Facilities.name}
section.paragraph:
Below are the Presence States for #{Facilities.name}. Select a Presence State below to edit or remove it. You can also use the link above to create a new Presence State for this Facility.
Available Presence States ________________________________________

section.heading: Create New Presence State
section.paragraph: Select one of the links below to indicate whether the new Presence State is "Available" or "Unavailable".

section.heading: Remove #{PresenceStates.status}: #{PresenceStates.show}?
section.paragraph: Click the button to below to remove #{PresenceStates.status} #{PresenceStates.show}.

section.heading: Create New Available Presence State
section.paragraph: Enter the Status of the Presence state, the text that should display with the Presence State.

section.heading: Edit #{PresenceStates.status} (#{PresenceStates.show})
section.paragraph: To change this Presence State to unavailable, select the "Change to Unavailable" link below. To change the status of this Presence State, enter the new status and click "Update". To remove this Presence State from the facility, choose "Remove Presence State" above.

section.heading: Create New Unavailable Presence State
section.paragraph: Enter the Status of the Presence state, the text that should display with the Presence State, and optionally the Duration of the Presence state.

section.heading: Edit #{PresenceStates.status} (#{PresenceStates.show})
section.paragraph: To change this Presence State to available, select the "Change to Available" link below. To edit the Presence State, edit the fields below and select "Update". To remove this Presence State from the facility, choose "Remove Presence State" above.

workflow.name: ManageQuickResponses
workflow.description: Manage Quick Responses & Quick Response Categories

section.heading: Manage Message Quick Response Categories
section.paragraph: To view a list of message quick responses, select List Quick Responses in the navigation bar above. To manage an existing quick response category, select a category below. To create a new category, select New Category in the navigation bar above.

section.heading: Manage #{TemplateCategories.name} Category
section.paragraph: To return to the main menu or remove the category, select the Manage Quick Response Categories Menu or the Remove #{TemplateCategories.name} Category link above. To remove a quick response from the category, select a quick response from the list below. To add a new or existing quick response to the category, select a link below.
Select a Quick Responses to remove it from Category #{TemplateCategories.name}.
Select the link below to add a new quick response to the category.
Select the link below to add an existing quick response to the category.
section.heading: Department Association for Category #{TemplateCategories.name}
section.paragraph: The following departments are associated with Category #{TemplateCategories.name}. To remove a department association from the category, select a department from the list below.

section.heading: Create Quick Responses Category
section.paragraph: Create a new Message Quick Response Category.

section.heading: New Message Quick Response for Category #{TemplateCategories.name}
section.paragraph: The Quick Response Name field will display in the user's quick response list for Category #{TemplateCategories.name}. The Message field contains the body of the message and must be 32 letters or less.

section.heading: Add Existing Message Quick Response
section.paragraph: Select a Message Quick Response from the list below to add to the #{TemplateCategories.name} category.

section.heading: Confirm Quick Response To Be Added
section.paragraph: Add the Message Quick Response "#{Templates.name}" to the #{TemplateCategories.name} category?

section.heading: Confirm Quick Response To Be Removed
section.paragraph: Remove the Message Quick Response "#{Templates.name}" from the #{TemplateCategories.name} category? This will not delete the Message Quick Response from other Categories.

section.heading: Confirm Category To Be Removed
section.paragraph: Remove the "#{TemplateCategories.name}" Category? This will not delete any Message Quick Responses.

section.heading: Message Quick Responses
section.paragraph:
To add a message quick response, click on the New Message Quick Response in the navigation bar above. Select a message quick response below to edit the text.
Quick Responses that do not require a room number:

section.heading: Update Message Quick Response

workflow.name: SendWebMessage
workflow.description: Sends a message from a web browser

section.heading: Send Personal or Group Message
section.paragraph: Messages can be sent to a single device or to multiple devices. To send a message to a single device, select Send Personal Message. To send a message to a group of devices, select Send Group Message. To send a predefined 'quick message' to a group of devices, select Send Quick Message.

section.heading: Search All Devices
section.paragraph: To search for a recipient, enter all or part of the recipient's name. To search for a phone number, enter all or part of the number. To display all available devices, leave all fields blank. To return to the Send Message menu, select Send Message Menu from the navigation bar above.

section.heading: Send Personal Message
section.paragraph: All users in your department that are associated to an online device are listed below. Select the recipient from the list that you would like to message. To return to the Send Message menu, select Send Message Menu from the navigation bar above. To send a message to a different device or recipient, select Search All Devices from the navigation bar above.

section.heading: Select Message
section.paragraph: To send a personal message to #{Devices.usr.first_name.as_substring(1,1)}.#{Devices.usr.last_name}, select a message from the Favorites list below. To send a message using a predefined template from your department, select a template from the Templates for My Department list below. To create your own message, select A Custom Message from the list below. To return to the Send Message menu, select Send Message Menu from the navigation bar above. If you do not see a template that you would like to use, select Template Categories from the navigation bar above. To send a message to a different recipient, select Select Different Recipient from the navigation bar above. To add additional recipients to the message, select Add Additional Recipients from the navigation bar above.
section.heading: Favorites
Templates for My Department
Template Categories
section.paragraph: Select a category from the list below to view the templates in that category. To create your own message instead, select A Custom Message. To return to the Send Message menu, select Send Message Menu from the navigation bar above. To go back to the list of templates, select Template List from the navigation bar above.

section.heading: Edit Personal Message
section.paragraph: Edit your message to #{Devices.usr.first_name.as_substring(1,1)}. #{Devices.usr.last_name} or send as is. Use the edit field to edit your message or select the Send button below to send your message. To return to the Send Message menu, select Send Message Menu from the navigation bar above. To send a different message, select Template List from the navigation bar above. To send a message to a different recipient, select Select Different Recipient from the navigation bar above. To add an additional recipient to the message, select Add Additional Recipients from the navigation bar above.

section.heading: Select Message
section.paragraph: Select a message from the list below to send to #{Devices.usr.first_name.as_substring(1,1)}. #{Devices.usr.last_name}. To create your own message, select A Custom Message from the list below. To return to the Send Message menu, select Send Message Menu from the navigation bar above. If you do not see a template that you would like to use, select Template Categories from the navigation bar above. To send a message to a different recipient, select Select Different Recipient from the navigation bar above. To add additional recipients to the message, select Add Additional Recipients from the navigation bar above.

section.heading: Recipients Search Results
section.paragraph: All users that match your search criteria and have an online device are listed below. Select a recipient from the list that you would like to message or select Search All Devices from the navigation bar above to change your search parameters.

section.heading: Message Confirmation
section.paragraph:
Your message was sent from #{DM.from.usr.reference_name} to #{Devices.usr.first_name.as_substring(1,1)}.#{Devices.usr.last_name}. To send another message, select Send Message Menu from the navigation bar above. To return to your home page, select Home from the top right of the screen.
Sent Message Content: #{DM.message}

section.heading: Search All Groups
section.paragraph: To search for a group, enter all or part of the group's name. To search for a group number, enter all or part of the number. To display all available group, leave both fields blank. To return to the Send Message menu, select Send Message Menu from the navigation bar above.

section.heading: Send Group Message
section.paragraph: Select a user group from the list below to message the group. To return to the Send Message menu, select Send Message Menu from the navigation bar above. If you do not see a group you would like to message, select Search All Groups from the navigation bar above.

section.heading: Select Message
section.paragraph: To send a group message to #{Groups.name} (#{Groups.target.number}), select a message from the lists below. To create your own message, select A Custom Message. To return to the Send Message menu, select Send Message Menu from the navigation bar above. If you do not see a template that you would like to use, select Template Categories from the navigation bar above. To send a message to a different group, select Select Different Group from the navigation bar above.

Templates for My Department
Template Categories
section.paragraph: Select a category from the list below to view the templates in that category. To return to the Send Message menu, select Send Message Menu from the navigation bar above. To go back to the list of templates, select Template List from the navigation bar above.

section.heading: Edit Group Message
section.paragraph: Edit your message to #{Groups.name} (#{Groups.target.number}) or send as is. Use the edit field to edit your message or select the Send button below to send your message. To return to the Send Message menu, select Send Message Menu from the navigation bar above. To send a different message, select Template List from the navigation bar above. To send a message to a different group, select Select Different Group from the navigation bar above.

section.heading: Select Message
section.paragraph: Select a message from the list below to send to #{Groups.name} (#{Groups.target.number}). To create your own message, select A Custom Message from the list below. To return to the Send Message menu, select Send Message Menu from the navigation bar above. If you do not see a template that you would like to use, select Template Categories from the navigation bar above. If you do not see a recipient you would like to add to the message, select Search All Devices from the navigation bar above.
